page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF........
page.content: RACHEL COOPER,AGE 13,MEMBER OF LISTER GIRLS,PUPIL OF SIBFORD FRIENDS SCHOOL. AT 7.20a.m. I AM WOKEN UP,I GET UP, WASH,BRUSH MY HAIR AND TEETH AND GET INTO MY GREY AND GREEN SCHOOL UNIFORM. AT 8a.m. I LEAVE FOR THE HILL FOR BREAKFAST OF CEREAL AND SAUSAGE OR BACON. AT 8.45 I GO TO THE FORM ROOM FOR REGISTRATION WITH MISS TAYLOR AND THEN TO MEETING FOR WORSHIP. AT 9.10 WE GO TO LESSONS, 7 IN THE DAY WITH MORNING AND LUNCH BREAKS. LESSONS END AT 4.30p.m. AND I RETURN TO THE HOUSE TO CHANGE OUT OF UNIFORM INTO CASUALS. TEA IS AT 6p.m. AND THEN WE DO OUR PREP TILL 7.30p.m. IN SUMMER WE ARE ALLOWED TO STAY OUT UNTIL 9 P.M. AND THEN WE HAVE TO GO TO THE HOUSE, HAVE SUPPER AND THEN GO TO BED. MY SPARE TIME IS SPENT CHATTING, LISTENING TO MUSIC, DOING NEEDLEWORK AND PLAYING SPORT.
